duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform independent research at the interface of biology and electronic device engineering with a focus on sensing surface functionalization.
Design, perform, and evaluate experiments to resolve technical challenges in biosensor technology.
Work closely with internal and external teams and present and publish high-impact results.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in engineering (e.g. Biomedical Engineering, Chemical Engineering, or Electrical Engineering) or the sciences (e.g. Biochemistry, Chemistry, or Physics)
